page.title: 15ASHTON FARM DAIRY.
page.content: The{farm buildings}include 1 storage barn, 2 covered yards, 2 silage clamps, 1 slurry tank. They have 129 cows in the herd 108 are being milked. They have one calf rearing unit,all A.I.bred. They get three feeds from their mother and the other six weeks they are bottle fed. Only 12 cows can be milked at one time. They are computer fed. They have a 150 year old barn. It used to be a grain storage but it is now a work shop. {Machinery:-} There are three tractors on the farm but there are 8-9 counting the one from Highlea Farm. There are 50-60 acres of land. They also keep a few sheep and pigs. There are two farm workers.The dairyman and tractor driver. There are six residents altogether.{Held by Sir R. Glynn.
